trans-unit.source: Customizes rendering for the Web control to which the control adapter is attached, to modify the default markup or behavior for specific browsers.
trans-unit.target: Tilpasser gjengivelse for webkontroll som kontroll-adapteren er knyttet til, endre standard markup eller virkemåte for lesere.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> class is the base class from which Web controls inherit.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>klassen er den første klassen som arver fra webkontroller.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>

trans-unit.source: It defines many properties common to all Web controls.
trans-unit.target: Den definerer mange egenskaper som er felles for alle webkontroller.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>

trans-unit.source: A WebControlAdapter object is a component that substitutes certain <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> class or inherited methods and events in its execution life cycle to allow browser- or markup-specific handling.
trans-unit.target: En WebControlAdapter-objektet er en komponent som erstatter visse <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>klassen eller arvede metoder og hendelser i livssyklusen kjøring å tillate leseren eller markup spesifikk behandling.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework maps a single control adapter to a derived <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> object for each client request.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework tilordner en enkelt kontroll-adapteren til en avledet <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>objekt for hver klientforespørselen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>

trans-unit.source: An adapter modifies a control behavior for a specific browser or class of browsers or acts as an arbitrary filter on some capability.
trans-unit.target: Et kort endrer kontrollen virkemåte for en bestemt webleser eller type nettlesere eller fungerer som en tilfeldig filter på noen funksjonen.

trans-unit.source: Much of the adaptability in rendering behavior can be encapsulated in the specialized classes that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> class.
trans-unit.target: Mye tilpasningsdyktigheten i gjengivelse virkemåte kan innkapsles i spesialiserte klassene som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, it is likely that a single adapter can be used for a number of browser class behaviors or that inclusion of the adaptability in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> classes might make the use of a control adapter unnecessary.
trans-unit.target: Det er derfor sannsynlig at ett enkelt kort kan brukes til flere nettleseren klassen virkemåter eller at inkludering av tilpasningsdyktigheten i den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>klasser kan gjøre bruk av en kontroll-adapteren unødvendige.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>

trans-unit.source: Controls themselves do not necessarily require an adapter.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller seg krever ikke nødvendigvis et kort.

trans-unit.source: If controls are extended through composition, generally the adapters for the child controls are sufficient.
trans-unit.target: Hvis Kontroller utvides via sammensetning, vanligvis er adapterne for underordnede kontroller tilstrekkelig.

trans-unit.source: Each control has explicit mappings to adapters through the .browser definition files.
trans-unit.target: Hver kontroll har eksplisitt tilordninger til adapterne gjennom .browser definisjonsfilene.

trans-unit.source: Thus, any access to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Adapter%2A> property of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> uses the <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities> object extracted from the .browser definition files to perform the lookup for the mapping of the adapter to control.
trans-unit.target: Derfor noen tilgang til den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Adapter%2A>for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>bruker den <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities>objektet som er hentet fra .browser definisjonsfiler å utføre oppslaget for tilordning av kortet styre.</xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Adapter%2A>

trans-unit.source: During processing, the .NET Framework intercepts calls to the overridable methods of a control that could be target-specific.
trans-unit.target: Under behandling fanger .NET Framework kall til overstyrbare metodene for en kontroll som kan være målspesifikke.

trans-unit.source: If a control adapter is attached, the .NET Framework calls the associated adapter methods.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en kontroll-adapteren er tilkoblet, kaller .NET Framework metodene som er tilknyttet kortet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter>

trans-unit.source: The rendering for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> typically consists of a beginning and ending tag, and some inner markup between the beginning and ending tags.
trans-unit.target: Gjengivelse for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>vanligvis består av en start- og avsluttende koden, og noen indre markup mellom start- og slutt koder.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>

trans-unit.source: The tags are defined when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> is created.
trans-unit.target: Kodene defineres når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>er opprettet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.%23ctor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.%23ctor%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The tags are generated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A> methods, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Kodene er generert av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A>metoder, henholdsvis.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A>

trans-unit.source: The inner markup is generated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderContents%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Indre markup er generert av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderContents%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderContents%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.Render%2A> method generates all markup, by calling methods in the following order: 1.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.Render%2A>metoden, alle markup ved å kalle metoder i denne rekkefølgen: 1.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.Render%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderContents%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderContents%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderContents%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.IsEnabled%2A> property returns `true` only if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> and all its parent controls are enabled.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.IsEnabled%2A>returnerer `true` bare hvis det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>og alle overordnede kontroller er aktivert.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.IsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.Control%2A> property returns a strongly typed reference to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.Control%2A>Returnerer en forespørselsparameter av sterk type referanse til <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.Control%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter> class when it creates the corresponding <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> object.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework internt bygger en ny forekomst av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter>klasse når det oppretter den tilsvarende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter>

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the Web control to which this control adapter is attached.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til webkontroll som er tilknyttet denne kontrollen adapteren.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter> object is attached to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> object, the .NET Framework calls on the adapter life-cycle methods instead of the control methods.
trans-unit.target: Når en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter>objekt er knyttet til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>objektet, .NET Framework-kall for kort livssyklus metoder i stedet for Kontrollmetoder.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl"></xref> to which this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter"></xref> is attached.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl"> </xref> som denne <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter"> </xref> er koblet.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the Web control and all its parent controls are enabled.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om webkontrollen og alle overordnede kontroller er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: The IsEnabled property provides access for the adapter and any of its derived classes to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen IsEnabled gir tilgang for adapteren og noen av de avledede klassene til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> scans the hierarchy of parent controls and returns `true` only if the Web control and all its parents are enabled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Skanner hierarki med overordnede kontroller, og returnerer `true` bare hvis webkontrollen og alle overordnede er aktivert.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl"></xref> and all its parent controls are enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den tilknyttede <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl"> </xref> og alle overordnede kontroller er aktivert, ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Generates the target-specific markup for the control to which the control adapter is attached.
trans-unit.target: Genererer målspesifikke markup for kontrollen som er tilknyttet kontroll-adapteren.

trans-unit.source: The Render method generates target-specific markup to send to the client browser.
trans-unit.target: Metoden gjengivelse genererer målspesifikke markup sende til klientleseren.

trans-unit.source: Render is called in place of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Render%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method if a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter> object is attached to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> object.
trans-unit.target: Gjengivelse kalles i stedet for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Render%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden hvis en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter>objekt er knyttet til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Render%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> containing methods to render the target-specific output.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> som inneholder metoder for å gjengi målspesifikke utdataene.

trans-unit.source: Creates the beginning tag for the Web control in the markup that is transmitted to the target browser.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter begynnelsen-kode for webkontrollen i koder som er sendt til mål-leseren.

trans-unit.source: Override the RenderBeginTag method to write additional markup tags or add attributes to the beginning tag for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> object.
trans-unit.target: Overstyr RenderBeginTag-metoden for å skrive flere-koder eller legge til attributter i begynnelsen-koden for det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>

trans-unit.source: Use RenderBeginTag in conjunction with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A> method to assure beginning and ending tag consistency.
trans-unit.target: Bruk RenderBeginTag sammen med den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A>metode for å sikre begynner og med slutt koden konsekvensfeil.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> containing methods to render the target-specific output.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> som inneholder metoder for å gjengi målspesifikke utdataene.

trans-unit.source: Generates the target-specific inner markup for the Web control to which the control adapter is attached.
trans-unit.target: Genererer målspesifikke indre markup for webkontroll som er tilknyttet kontroll-adapteren.

trans-unit.source: The RenderContents method generates the inner markup, between the beginning and ending tags for the control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RenderContents genererer den interne markup mellom start- og slutt koder for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Typically, markup is generated by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.Render%2A>, which calls methods in the following order: 1.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis markup er generert av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.Render%2A>, som kaller metoder i denne rekkefølgen: 1.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.Render%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A>

trans-unit.source: RenderContents.
trans-unit.target: RenderContents.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A>

trans-unit.source: Override RenderContents to generate target-specific inner markup to send to the client browser.
trans-unit.target: Overstyre RenderContents for å generere målspesifikke indre markup sende til klientleseren.

trans-unit.source: The RenderContents base method calls <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderContents%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: RenderContents basere metodekall <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderContents%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderContents%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderContents%2A?displayProperty=fullName> base method calls <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, which in turn calls <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: { <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderContents%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Base metoden anrop <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A?displayProperty=fullName>som kaller <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderContents%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Thus, overrides of RenderContents should call the RenderContents base method only if its processing is in addition to, rather than instead of, <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Overstyring av RenderContents må derfor kalle metoden RenderContents base bare hvis behandlingen i tillegg til i stedet for i stedet for <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> containing methods to render the target-specific output.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> som inneholder metoder for å gjengi målspesifikke utdataene.

trans-unit.source: Creates the ending tag for the Web control in the markup that is transmitted to the target browser.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter den avsluttende koden for webkontrollen i koder som er sendt til mål-leseren.

trans-unit.source: Override the RenderEndTag method to write additional markup tags or add attributes to the ending tag for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> object.
trans-unit.target: Overstyr RenderEndTag-metoden for å skrive flere-koder eller legge til attributter i den avsluttende koden for det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>

trans-unit.source: Use RenderEndTag in conjunction with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A> method to assure beginning and ending tag consistency.
trans-unit.target: Bruk RenderEndTag sammen med den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A>metode for å sikre begynner og med slutt koden konsekvensfeil.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> containing methods to render the target-specific output.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> som inneholder metoder for å gjengi målspesifikke utdataene.
